entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening and ending before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
